description: Painted photograph of woman in green dress seated before a large mirror with standing little girl in pink and white; girl's doll at their feet
markings: [Gurney & Son Photo N.Y.], printed in brown, below image; [Just like Mama], in pencil, at top edge, on back; [PHOTOGRAPHIC ARTISTS/J.GURNEY & SON,/707/BROADWAY,/N.Y.], in black, inside an oval-shaped belt topped with an eagle, at center on back
medium: Albumen print, hand painted (carte de visite)
title: Untitled
